title: Takamitsu OHIGASHI
text:
Profile
Postdoctoral researcher working at the Kondoh Lab in Tohoku University, Japan.
Currently, I’m studying at the Ushio Lab in Hong Kong University of Science and Technology.
        
Email: tkmtohgs1031 at gmail.com

title: Takamitsu OHIGASHI
text:
Research Keywords
Soil microbial community, Environmental DNA, Community ecology, Time-series analysis

title: Takamitsu OHIGASHI
text:
Biography

1996: Born in Osaka and grew up in Nishinomiya, Hyogo, Japan
2015 ~ 2019: Faculty of Agriculture, Hokkaido University
2019 ~ 2021: Master course, Graduate School of Global Food Resources, Hokkaido University
2021 ~ 2024: Ph.D. course, Graduate School of Global Food Resources, Hokkaido University
2024: Ph.D. (Food Resources), Hokkaido University
2024 ~ present: JSPS Research Fellow (PD) at Tohoku University (Kondoh Lab)

title: Publication
text:
Darnajoux, R.†*, Haynes, S., Renaudin, M.†, Magain, N., Dani, S., Koonin, S., Miadlikowska, J., Uchida, Y., Ohigashi, T., Haughland, D., Lutzoni, F., Bellenger, J.P. & Zhang, X.
“Global role of vanadium for nitrogen fixation in extratropical forests”Authorea








Ohigashi, T.*, Mori, S., Tago, K., Ohbayashi, T., Hara, S. & Uchida, Y. (in press)
“Differential responses of soil ammonia-oxidizing bacterial and archaeal communities to land-use change in Zambia”Microbes and Environments





Soe, N. C., Yohannes, Y. B., Ohigashi, T., Nakata, H., Tatsumi, C., Uchida, Y., Mufalo, W., Ito, M., Sato, T., Igarashi, T., Ikenaka, Y., Ishizuka, M., & Nakayama, S. M. M.* (2024)
“Effect of chicken manure amendment on lead burden in mice: Exposure to lead-spiked soil” Journal of Soils and Sediments, 24, 2001–2011





Ohigashi, T., Schloter, M., Schulz, S., Munthali, K., & Uchida, Y.* (2021)
“Changes in soil prokaryotic diversity in response to land-use changes in sub-Saharan Africa” Soil Systems, 5(4), 62

title: Takamitsu OHIGASHI, 大東孝充
text:
## Profile
Postdoctoral researcher working at the Kondoh Lab in Tohoku University, Japan.
Currently, I’m studying at the Ushio Lab in Hong Kong University of Science and Technology.
Email: tkmtohgs1031 at gmail.com

title: 大東 孝充
text:
プロフィール
東北大学生命科学研究科 統合生態分野（近藤研） に所属し、特任研究員（学振PD）をしています。
現在は香港科技大学海洋科学科 潮研 に滞在し研究しています。
        
メール: tkmtohgs1031 at gmail.com

title: 大東 孝充
text:
Research Keywords
Soil microbial community, Environmental DNA, Community ecology, Time-series analysis

title: 大東 孝充
text:
Biography

1996: Born in Osaka and grew up in Nishinomiya, Hyogo, Japan
2015 ~ 2019: Faculty of Agriculture, Hokkaido University
2019 ~ 2021: Master course, Graduate School of Global Food Resources, Hokkaido University
2021 ~ 2024: Ph.D. course, Graduate School of Global Food Resources, Hokkaido University
2024: Ph.D. (Food Resources), Hokkaido University
2024 ~ present: JSPS Research Fellow (PD) at Tohoku University (Kondoh Lab)

title: 大東 孝充
text:
研究キーワード
土壌微生物群集, 環境DNA, 群集生態学, 時系列解析

title: 大東 孝充
text:
経歴

1996年: 大阪府生まれ兵庫県西宮市育ち
2015 ~ 2019年: 北海道大学農学部
2019 ~ 2021年: 修士課程, 北海道大学国際食資源学院
2021 ~ 2024年: 博士課程, 北海道大学国際食資源学院
2024年: 博士号（食資源学）取得, 北海道大学
2024年 ~ 現在: 日本学術振興会特別研究員PD（近藤研）
